about_the_game:
You've set up camp at the place where civilization turns into unexplored wilderness. You'll travel increasingly far from your base into dangerous territory in your quest to upgrade your gear and defeat the boss at the end of each biome. While the wilderness is ruthless, the bustling town you've made home is a safe haven where you can build, farm, and sell goods at the market.

Wild's Edge is a 2D, open world game with engaging, real-time combat and many elements drawn survival and rogue-like games. As you progress, you'll unlock abilities like dashing and blocking that will help you better fight enemies. Each biome has a large variety of enemies with unique moves and attack patterns.

Features

  • Fight your way through each biome and its unique enemies
  • Gather increasingly good gear, in turn allowing you to tredge deeper into the wild
  • Build a base with a variety of structures that will help you upgrade your weapons and armor
  • Farm materials automatically using upgradeable structures
  • Beat each biome by defeating the final boss
  • Complete all the missions in your mission book
